mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, description, dict_id, sort_order, text, value, status from sys_dict_item where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict_item( id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, description, dict_id, sort_order, text, value, status) values (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser}, #{description}, #{dictId}, #{sortOrder}, #{text}, #{value}, #{status})
